title: What is the interpretation of seeing the color black in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq?

preview.html: The color black in a dream: The color black is one of the colors that express sadness and sorrow, and therefore when they see it in a dream, some people believe that it carries unpleasant meanings, and from here some commentators such as Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq explained its meanings. Seeing the color black in a dream, which is somewhat different from reality, is sometimes good news and sometimes the opposite appears. What is the interpretation of seeing the color black in a dream? The color black in a dream has more positive meanings than negative meanings, because black is the color of justice and security, and therefore It is the primary color in the uniform of a lawyer or judge. Aesthetically, it represents the night and the stars that appear in it. When someone sees himself wearing black clothes in his dream, this is a sign that he will be exposed to crises and obstacles that will make him feel sad and anxious. Jurists said that the color black is a sign of anxiety and sadness in the event that the person is not accustomed to wearing it in reality, If he is used to wearing it, it is good. And Mahmoud is a good omen. Seeing a black child in a dream is an omen for the dreamer that he will soon meet his life partner, who will be good and kind and with whom he will live joy and happiness. If an unmarried woman sees him in her dream, then this dream has nothing to do with engagement or betrothal, but rather it is a sign of her superiority In all matters of her life, whether personal or professional. Wear black clothes in the form of a dress to a party, because it is a sign that you are going through a sad situation regarding something. The color black in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted that he sees the color black as a sign of trouble and sadness that the dreamer may go through. And when a person gets sick and sees this color, This dream is a good sign of recovery from illness. Seeing a dead person wearing black clothes is a sign that he has committed some sins in his life and is now in need of prayer and charity. As for seeing a brown animal, it indicates that the dreamer is jealous, and may be hurt or hate things, so he should memorize dhikr and recite The Qur’an. The black dog indicates that the visionary is surrounded by a large group of enemies, and the black spider indicates evil. The black color in the dream of Imam al-Sadiq. Imam al-Sadiq interpreted the dream about the color black as evidence of tragedies and worries, and when he saw it and the dreamer did not actually prefer it or was not accustomed to wearing it This indicates the anguish he is going through. The following days: Wearing black clothes and the dreamer likes to wear them, this is a good dream and portends good news. But seeing the sick person wearing black clothes may indicate a delay in his recovery, and sometimes it indicates death, and God is Great and All-Knowing. If the pregnant woman sees that she is shining in black clothes, then this dream is a sign of her anxiety. From the matter of childbirth, and this vision heralds her ease in giving birth, and if she sees her home furniture in black, it is a sign of her need for money, and seeing her possessions in this color, is an indication that she will give birth to a male child. What is the interpretation of a dream of black for a free woman? A dream of black for single women, seeing an unmarried woman. A married woman wearing a black dress indicates the anxiety and sorrow she will suffer if she does not really like this color, but if her

title: Praying in a dream

preview.html: Prayer in a dream is one of the interpretations that remains fair to the person who wants this dream, and we will explain more through the following lines from gptafser.com/, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a single girlWhen an unmarried girl sees herself praying in a dream, this is evidence of Righting her life and changing the course of her affairs for the better, by the command of God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing prayer at the time of Ramadan in a dream for a single girl. A sign of the collapse of worries and freedom from problems. And staying away from everything that is not good about her. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is leading the world in prayer The vision shows that she is doing many good and righteous things that make her better in the eyes of men, especially in the eyes of God as well. Whereas if an unmarried girl dreams that she is praying with people she knows. This is evidence of the many things that make her close to kinship. And the things that encourage Consolidating the relationship and kinship. Tarawih prayer in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the imminence of her marriage to a good person. Seeing a missed prayer in an unmarried girl’s dream means getting rid of the debts that you were already suffering from. As for seeing an unmarried girl, praying humbly in a dream. It is evidence On the righteousness of this girl and the good deeds of her mother and many good deeds. See also: Delaying the dream prayer. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees herself praying at home in a dream. The vision may indicate good affairs for her at home and the personal situation in which she lives. But if the married woman sees herself praying at home in a dream. She herself in a dream prays with her husband. The vision indicates success in matters related to their homes and payment for it in all other matters thanks to God Almighty. If a married woman prays, and gives her voice in a dream. This may mean that he goes through many good things and performs many good deeds with grace. Almighty God. In seeing the Witr prayer for a married woman, this means many good signs. Through which there will be lasting health and many good things that change the course of her life thanks to what she does not know. Just as there is a prayer in a dream, there is no fear of it, such as seeing it or Performing it while awake. Prayer in a married woman’s dream indicates the fairness of her affairs, whether in life or otherwise. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a man and its meaning. When a married man dreams that he is praying in his home. The vision indicates stability in matters related to his life and throughout his affairs. If a person dreams that he is praying in his home. He leads people in prayer. The vision showed that he is a good man who does good deeds and deeds. Something that puts him in a better position with God Almighty, but also with people. As for seeing the Witr prayer in a married man’s dream, it indicates getting rid of the debts that the visionary person was suffering from. If a married man sees himself waking up his wife to perform prayer in a dream. The vision can show many good and good things that bring the couple together. A dream of praying with family and relatives in a married man’s dream may indicate a strengthening of the kinship relationship that brings families and relatives together. Read

title: Interpretation of something coming out of the ear in a dream or a substance entering my ear in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of something coming out or entering the ear, whether dirt, a yellowish-black substance or liquid, gravel, worms, ants, a finger, wax, or blood is removed, for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for pregnant women, for divorced women, and many others. Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of something coming out of the ear in a dream. The exit of ants from the ear or other organs indicates the death of the dreamer as a witness. Whoever dreams that something he does not like has entered his ear while he is awake, or something happened that bothers him, then he hears what he does not like. Whoever dreams of a pebble falling In his ear, he hears words that harm and hurt him. Seeing light coming out of it or entering it, then seeing it indicates goodness and guidance, and that it is obedience to God, and that God Almighty has accepted his work. No matter how much he hates the smells that enter or come out of it, Imam Al-Nabulsi says in interpreting this vision that it is It indicates that its owner is wrong and straying from the truth, and has committed acts that anger God Almighty. Whoever sees in a dream that he is putting one of his fingers in his ear, the dream indicates that its owner will die without the path of guidance and that he will be sealed with a bad ending. Whoever dreams of someone putting his fingers in His ear, this indicates that he is letting his family down. What does it mean in a dream that he is eating the dirt that comes out of the ear? Earwax discharge The vision gives you good news that it will remove harm from you and comfort you. Perhaps you are trying to correct your situation and listen to what is beneficial and avoid listening to what displeases God. He continued to give you good news about your righteousness and because you are against God. Blood coming out of the ear in a dream indicates that you are hearing important and happy news that benefits the person and his family, and this is also evidence of warding off harm and avoiding difficulties. Wax emitting from the ear, if your dream is true, means that you do not like hearing Gossiping and being upset by it, while trying to advise and stay away from anything that is harmful to you from speech and try to verify the words that are broadcast to you and you are prepared for what you hear while preserving your reputation. Interpretation of wax, gum, or meat coming out in a dream. Removing wax or glue from inside the ears indicates the disappearance of Sadness, harm, and alleviation of the difficulties experienced by the dreamer, and whoever saw ear glue in his hands received an antidote and treatment from poisons and was far from that. Infectious diseases. It also signifies safety from the conspiracies of tyrants who seek to harm the fortuneteller. Whoever dreams that he is removing the gums from his ears in a dream, if the gums are pure, clean, and free of impurities, then this indicates that he has heard good news. Also, seeing the gums from the ears of others indicates the presence of conspiracies and machinations. Whoever sees the ear glue removed, this indicates that the dreamer listens to forbidden things, so he must stop listening to what displeases God, and stay away from listening to chatter and gossip, and listen to forbidden things and not delve into the symptoms of others and to listen. In everything that benefits a man. What has been suggested regarding the harm of seeing glue coming out of the ear? Whoever sees that he is removing the glue and playing with the glue, then his evidence is that the dreamer is short and lazy in doing tasks and acts of obedience as he should. title: Interpretation of the death of a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The death of a child in a dream is one of the frightening dreams that make the dreamer feel that a crisis or distress is approaching in his life and he feels fear for his children if he is married and has children. The vision can be a sign of the problems that the dreamer is going through when they can be solved and exited. Let us learn about the meanings of the dream and what it shows. Is it bad to see the death of a child in the dream of a single, married, or pregnant woman? The death of a child in a dream: The vision leads to bad changes in the dreamer’s life that will make him live in distress for a period of time and not get out of it easily. The vision suggests that the dreamer will go through a bad atmosphere at work that will make him unable He has to continue working due to many disagreements between him and his colleagues, but he must look for another job so that he can escape from financial and psychological problems. We find that the death of a child in a dream is one of the happy signs that indicate the elimination of all sorrows, worries and problems in the life of the dreamer. A dream according to Ibn Sirin Our imam Ibn Sirin explains to us that the death of a child in a dream is one of the unwanted visions, as the vision exposes the dreamer to financial problems and the accumulation of debts on him, which makes him unable to pay. for them. Here he should pray to his Lord for forgiveness and forgiveness of debts, and work to find a job that provides him with a suitable income, then he will be saved from these problems. We find that the dream can suggest positive meanings if the dreamer sees a girl covered in a shroud, then the vision is a sign of the collapse of adversities and worries, whatever they may be, and this Because the shroud is white and it is so. It is known that white is the color of kindness, happiness, and freedom from worries and anxiety. It causes a child to cry when hearing sad news, which distracts the viewer and makes him go through a difficult stage for a period of time. However, if an individual witnesses the death of a child without crying, then the dream is evidence of surviving crises, whatever they may be. The death of a child in a dream for an unmarried woman. The vision leads the dreamer to be exposed to many unexpected experiences and difficulties, making her feel disappointed and wounded, but she must pass these stage and not remain in despair for a longer period of time, but rather she must grow and always strive for it. Positive change. If the child wears ugly clothes during his death, this indicates many sorrows in the dreamer’s life and his inability to achieve his goals, as calamities and recurring problems occur. However, if the child returns to life and is in good condition, this indicates the approach of happy news and joys in the dreamer’s life and ability. To achieve himself and his goals. The death of a young child in a dream of an unmarried woman. We find that the dream depicts the dreamer’s suffering during these days, either due to not participating in appropriate work or due to not studying, especially if he cried profusely in the dream, but will have to try to get up again. To fulfill all her desires and be closer to her Lord. The vision is a warning to the dreamer of the need to abandon the sins that made her worse than before. The death of a child in a dream for a married woman. The death of a child for a married woman is one of the disturbing dreams that lead her to a problem with her husband and her life is full of anguish and sadness.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a talking snake by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Whoever sees a snake or snake talking in a dream to an unmarried, married, pregnant or divorced girl, whether she is black, yellow, red, white or green, this happens according to Ibn Sirin, according to Imam Al-. Honest and more. The snake in a dream is one of the important dreams that we constantly see in our dreams and it carries many important meanings for us that we need to know, as the appearance of the snake is one of the frightening things that causes panic in the dreamer. It also indicates the presence of enemies or competitors who have positions, money, and very great power who are trying to undermine you in public life, as the snake or serpent is one of the most common enemies of man in public life. In our article today, we will review for you the interpretation of seeing a snake speaking in a dream, as explained by the famous commentator Ibn Sirin in his interpretations. Interpretation of a talking snake in a dream: If you see a snake or a talking snake in a dream, it means that someone is lying or manipulating you and you are not fully aware that this is happening. Dreams of talking about snakes are about protecting our interests against those who might harm us. The snake spoke to the dreamer and spoke to him with soft words, and this Evidence that he will receive a lot of good. According to local beliefs, dreaming of a talking snake is one of the most blessed dreams and it is said that it is a good time to access great positive energy in your life. Seeing a talking snake means that you have a hidden enemy who wants to talk to you and solve problems with you . Snakes also mean the use of black magic, and here they can also indicate that your enemy is cursing you or using spells to harm you. Whoever sees a snake talking to him and saying nice words to him in a dream, means enjoying pleasant moments with his opponent or taking advantage of the enemy’s hand. But if the snake speaks to him harshly In a dream, it means that you are suffering from tyranny and injustice practiced upon you by the enemy. And if you are addressing or talking to the snake in the dream, this may mean that you are listening to your subconscious mind and that you know that you are receiving a message about your inner ability to deal with some situations in your life, but If a snake attacks or bites you, the message may be that it is time to stop avoiding something and that it is time to explore new options. If there is a snake in your dream talking to you then this dream has a positive meaning. This means that you have a nice period ahead of you. You will have a lot of new features coming your way, so don't worry. Snake Dream Modern Meaning Seeing such a dream should be a truly inspiring experience, regardless of whether the dream itself makes you feel good or bad. If you dream of a talking snake, it may mean that you are afraid to hear something from someone. You are trying to avoid someone because you are really not ready to feel what this person will say. It may be a reflection of your feeling of guilt and your unwillingness to take responsibility for what you have done. On the other hand, maybe someone is constantly judging you for no apparent reason. On the bright side, dreams of a talking snake can be truly supernatural and helpful. It could be a snake

preview.html: Seeing a cabaret, a bar, a disco, and a night club for a single woman is for a married woman, and for a pregnant woman is for a man, and seeing a cabaret and wine for Ibn Sirin, and seeing a bottle of wine and a late night in the night club at home. An amusement park in a dream is one of the dreams that many girls see in their dreams and it gives them great happiness and joy when they see it. As amusement parks are among the favorite places for many people that we go to to find joy and happiness and get a new change in public life, inside the amusement park there are many different games that are used to feel joy with all the people present with us and we will explain to you the correct interpretation of the vision in Dreams of single people. Interpretation of a club in a dream. A dream of a club is an essential psychological expression that depicts a mixture of desire and energy that we find difficult to channel or channel. It is best at the end of this dream to see the girl as if she is leaving the club or escaping from its noise. The noise in this dream expresses the dreamer’s desire to Getting rid of daily worries or problems. This part does not indicate the evil hidden in the viewer, but rather depicts his energy and negative thoughts. One entrance to a noisy place such as a nightclub can indicate a noisy scene full of events and variables and is an expression of the lack of clarity of vision in the future. Perhaps the disco expressed an interference Choices and inability to differentiate, because in the hustle and bustle, a person cannot distinguish between wheat and straw. He hates a cabaret in a dream because it is a place for dancing, and this is annoying, and we cannot find anything positive in this place. A disco can depict darkness or loneliness in The soul can express loneliness or alienation. Perhaps it expresses religiously and socially forbidden desires. In one dream, it can express a struggle deep in the soul between preserving values ​​and principles or abandoning them for fleeting pleasures. A married woman who sees in her dream that she is dancing in a nightclub In reality, she suffers from deep psychological pressure. Amusements in this context are nothing more than a psychological refuge, but rather indicate wrong choices in dealing with issues and dealing with them. Therefore, a married woman must be careful in all her actions to confront difficulties and control her whims. Volatile moods. As everything in the nightclub expresses imbalance and fluctuations, the lights change and the colors as well, and people’s faces are blurred, so are the sounds, and the dream in its entirety, is an expression of problems and anxiety that have not yet found their way. To a solution. A disco for a man in a dream expresses his disturbed psychological or social state. The inability to achieve goals at work or within the family can push a man to see nightclubs in a dream, because it is the only place that expresses the depth of fears such as bars, but these fears appear quickly On the surface of memory and consciousness. The subconscious mind tries to take us to the noisiest places so that we do not listen to our consciousness and suffer from it. A disco dream is one of those dreams.

Seeing the color black in a dream, which is somewhat different from reality, is sometimes good news and sometimes the opposite appears. What is the interpretation of seeing the color black in a dream? The color black in a dream has more positive meanings than negative meanings, because black is the color of justice and security, and therefore It is the primary color in the uniform of a lawyer or judge. Aesthetically, it represents the night and the stars that appear in it. When someone sees himself wearing black clothes in his dream, this is a sign that he will be exposed to crises and obstacles that will make him feel sad and anxious. Jurists said that the color black is a sign of anxiety and sadness in the event that the person is not accustomed to wearing it in reality, If he is used to wearing it, it is good. And Mahmoud is a good omen. Seeing a black child in a dream is an omen for the dreamer that he will soon meet his life partner, who will be good and kind and with whom he will live joy and happiness. title: Interpretation of something coming out of the ear in a dream or a substance entering my ear in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of something coming out or entering the ear, whether dirt, a yellowish-black substance or liquid, gravel, worms, ants, a finger, wax, or blood is removed, for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for pregnant women, for divorced women, and many others. Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of something coming out of the ear in a dream. The exit of ants from the ear or other organs indicates the death of the dreamer as a witness. Whoever dreams that something he does not like has entered his ear while he is awake, or something happened that bothers him, then he hears what he does not like. Whoever dreams of a pebble falling In his ear, he hears words that harm and hurt him. Seeing light coming out of it or entering it, then seeing it indicates goodness and guidance, and that it is obedience to God, and that God Almighty has accepted his work. No matter how much he hates the smells that enter or come out of it, Imam Nabulsi says in the interpretation of this vision that it is It indicates that its owner is wrong and straying from the truth, and has committed acts that anger God Almighty. Whoever sees in a dream that he is putting one of his fingers in his ear, the dream indicates that its owner will die without the path of guidance and that he will be sealed with a bad ending. Whoever dreams of someone putting his fingers in His ear, this indicates that he is letting his family down. What does it mean in a dream that he is eating the dirt that comes out of the ear? Earwax discharge The vision gives you good news that it will remove harm from you and comfort you. Perhaps you are trying to correct your situation and listen to what is beneficial and avoid listening to what displeases God. He continued to give you good news about your righteousness and because you are against God. Blood coming out of the ear in a dream indicates that you are hearing important and happy news that benefits the person and his family, and this is also evidence of warding off harm and avoiding difficulties. Wax emitting from the ear, if your dream is true, means that you do not like hearing Gossiping and being upset by it, while trying to advise and stay away from anything that is harmful to you from speech and try to verify the words that are broadcast to you and you are prepared for what you hear while preserving your reputation. Interpretation of wax, gum, or meat coming out in a dream. Removing wax or glue from inside the ears indicates the disappearance of Sadness, harm, and alleviation of the difficulties experienced by the dreamer, and whoever saw ear glue in his hands received an antidote and treatment from poisons and was far from that. Infectious diseases. It also signifies safety from the conspiracies of tyrants who seek to harm the fortuneteller. Whoever dreams that he is removing the gums from his ears in a dream, if the gums are pure, clean, and free of impurities, this indicates that he has heard good news. Also, seeing the gums from the ears of others indicates the presence of conspiracies and machinations. Whoever sees the ear glue removed, this indicates that the dreamer listens to forbidden things, so he must stop listening to what displeases God, and stay away from listening to chatter and gossip, and listen to forbidden things and not delve into the symptoms of others and to listen. In everything that benefits a man. What has been suggested regarding the harm of seeing glue coming out of the ear? Whoever sees that he is removing the glue and playing with the glue, then his evidence is that the dreamer is short and lazy in doing tasks and acts of obedience as he should. title: Interpretation of the death of a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The death of a child in a dream is one of the frightening dreams that make the dreamer feel that a crisis or distress is approaching in his life and he feels fear for his children if he is married and has children. The vision can be a sign of the problems that the dreamer is going through when they can be solved and exited. Let us learn about the meanings of the dream and what it shows. Is it bad to see the death of a child in the dream of a single, married, or pregnant woman? The death of a child in a dream: The vision leads to bad changes in the dreamer’s life that will make him live in distress for a period of time and not get out of it easily. The vision suggests that the dreamer will go through a bad atmosphere at work that will make him unable He has to continue working due to many disagreements between him and his colleagues, but he must look for another job so that he can escape from financial and psychological problems. We find that the death of a child in a dream is one of the happy signs that indicate the elimination of all sorrows, worries and problems in the life of the dreamer. A dream according to Ibn Sirin Our imam Ibn Sirin explains to us that the death of a child in a dream is one of the unwanted visions, as the vision exposes the dreamer to financial problems and the accumulation of debts on him, which makes him unable to pay. for them. Here he should pray to his Lord for forgiveness and forgiveness of debts, and work to find a job that provides him with a suitable income, then he will be saved from these problems. We find that the dream can suggest positive meanings if the dreamer sees a girl covered in a shroud, then the vision is a sign of the collapse of adversities and worries, whatever they may be, and this Because the shroud is white and it is so. It is known that white is the color of kindness, happiness, and freedom from worries and anxiety. It causes a child to cry when hearing sad news, which distracts the viewer and makes him go through a difficult stage for a period of time. However, if an individual witnesses the death of a child without crying, then the dream is evidence of surviving crises, whatever they may be. The death of a child in a dream for an unmarried woman. The vision leads the dreamer to be exposed to many unexpected experiences and difficulties, making her feel disappointed and wounded, but she must pass these stage and not remain in despair for a longer period of time, but rather she must grow and always strive for it. Positive change. If the child wears ugly clothes during his death, this indicates many sorrows in the dreamer’s life and his inability to achieve his goals, as calamities and recurring problems occur. However, if the child returns to life and is in good condition, this indicates the approach of happy news and joys in the dreamer’s life and ability. To achieve himself and his goals. The death of a young child in a dream of an unmarried woman. We find that the dream depicts the dreamer’s suffering during these days, either due to not participating in appropriate work or due to not studying, especially if he cried profusely in the dream, but will have to try to get up again. To fulfill all her desires and be closer to her Lord. The vision is a warning to the dreamer of the need to abandon the sins that made her worse than before. The death of a child in a dream for a married woman. The death of a child for a married woman is one of the disturbing dreams that lead her to a problem with her husband and her life is full of anguish and sadness.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a talking snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Whoever sees a snake or snake talking in a dream to an unmarried, married, pregnant or divorced girl, whether she is black, yellow, red, white or green, this happens according to Ibn Sirin, according to Imam Al-. Honest and more. The snake in a dream is one of the important dreams that we constantly see in our dreams and it carries many important meanings for us that we need to know, as the appearance of the snake is one of the frightening things that causes panic in the dreamer. It also indicates the presence of enemies or competitors who have positions, money, and very great power who are trying to undermine you in public life, as the snake or serpent is one of the most common enemies of man in public life. In our article today, we will review for you the interpretation of seeing a snake speaking in a dream, as explained by the famous commentator Ibn Sirin in his interpretations. Interpretation of a talking snake in a dream: If you see a snake or a talking snake in a dream, it means that someone is lying or manipulating you and you are not fully aware that this is happening. Dreams of talking about snakes are about protecting our interests against those who might harm us. The snake spoke to the dreamer and spoke to him with soft words, and this Evidence that he will receive a lot of good. According to local beliefs, dreaming of a talking snake is one of the most blessed dreams and it is said that it is a good time to access great positive energy in your life. Seeing a talking snake means that you have a hidden enemy who wants to talk to you and solve problems with you . Snakes also mean the use of black magic, and here they can also indicate that your enemy is cursing you or using spells to harm you. Whoever sees a snake talking to him and saying nice words to him in a dream means enjoying pleasant moments with his opponent or taking advantage of the enemy’s hand. But if the snake speaks to him harshly In a dream, it means that you are suffering from tyranny and injustice practiced upon you by the enemy. And if you are addressing or talking to the snake in the dream, this may mean that you are listening to your subconscious mind and that you know that you are receiving a message about your inner ability to deal with some situations in your life, but If a snake attacks or bites you, the message may be that it is time to stop avoiding something and that it is time to explore new options. If there is a snake in your dream talking to you then this dream has a positive meaning. This means that you have a nice period ahead of you. You will have a lot of new features coming your way, so don't worry. Snake Dream Modern Meaning Seeing such a dream should be a truly inspiring experience, regardless of whether the dream itself makes you feel good or bad. If you dream of a talking snake, it may mean that you are afraid to hear something from someone. You are trying to avoid someone because you are really not ready to feel what this person will say. It may be a reflection of your feeling of guilt and your unwillingness to take responsibility for what you have done. On the other hand, maybe someone is constantly judging you for no apparent reason. On the bright side, dreams of a talking snake can be truly supernatural and helpful. It could be a snake
